languages.text: {n}Как бы вы ни старались привлечь внимание Ирлиэт, ничто в ее позе, выражении лица и едва заметном дыхании не меняется. Только тонкие пальцы плавно сменяют одни странные жесты на другие.{/n}

{n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Как бы вы ни старались привлечь внимание Ирлиэт, ничто в ее позе, выражении лица и едва заметном дыхании не меняется. Только тонкие пальцы плавно сменяют одни странные жесты на другие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Por más que intentas llamar la atención de Yrliet, no se produce cambio alguno en su postura, la expresión de su rostro ni su respiración casi inexistente. El único movimiento que percibes es el de sus dedos alargados trazando con soltura gestos extraños.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por más que intentas llamar la atención de Yrliet, no se produce cambio alguno en su postura, la expresión de su rostro ni su respiración casi inexistente. El único movimiento que percibes es el de sus dedos alargados trazando con soltura gestos extraños.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの気を惹こうと色々試みるが、彼女の姿勢や表情、かすかに聞こえる呼吸のいずれも変化がない。その細長い指だけが、奇妙な仕草とともに流れるように動いている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの気を惹こうと色々試みるが、彼女の姿勢や表情、かすかに聞こえる呼吸のいずれも変化がない。その細長い指だけが、奇妙な仕草とともに流れるように動いている。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}无论你多么努力地想引起伊莉耶特的注意，她的姿势、表情以及微弱的呼吸都没有任何变化。她唯一的动作来自她纤细的手指，正在流畅地做着一个又一个古怪手势。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}无论你多么努力地想引起伊莉耶特的注意，她的姿势、表情以及微弱的呼吸都没有任何变化。她唯一的动作来自她纤细的手指，正在流畅地做着一个又一个古怪手势。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet demeure figée dans la même position malgré tous vos efforts pour attirer son attention. Son expression reste impassible tandis qu'elle respire à peine et se contente de former avec ses doigts des gestes bizarres les uns à la suite des autres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet demeure figée dans la même position malgré tous vos efforts pour attirer son attention. Son expression reste impassible tandis qu'elle respire à peine et se contente de former avec ses doigts des gestes bizarres les uns à la suite des autres.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}So sehr du dich auch bemühst, Yrliets Aufmerksamkeit zu gewinnen, es verändert sich nichts an ihrer Haltung, ihrer Miene oder ihrer kaum wahrnehmbaren Atmung. Nur ihre schmalen Finger bewegen sich, wechseln flüssig von einer merkwürdigen Geste zur nächsten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}So sehr du dich auch bemühst, Yrliets Aufmerksamkeit zu gewinnen, es verändert sich nichts an ihrer Haltung, ihrer Miene oder ihrer kaum wahrnehmbaren Atmung. Nur ihre schmalen Finger bewegen sich, wechseln flüssig von einer merkwürdigen Geste zur nächsten.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet'in dikkatini çekmek için harcadığın tüm çabaya rağmen ne duruşunda, ne yüz ifadesinde ne de belli belirsiz nefes alışında bir değişiklik oluyor. Gözlemlediğin tek hareket, ince parmaklarıyla bir el hareketinden diğerine zorlanmadan geçişi oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No matter how hard you try to get Yrliet's attention, there is no change in her posture, facial expression, or barely-there breathing. The only movement comes from her narrow fingers fluidly moving from one strange gesture to another.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet'in dikkatini çekmek için harcadığın tüm çabaya rağmen ne duruşunda, ne yüz ifadesinde ne de belli belirsiz nefes alışında bir değişiklik oluyor. Gözlemlediğin tek hareket, ince parmaklarıyla bir el hareketinden diğerine zorlanmadan geçişi oluyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
